definition: lit. to attend to one thing and lose sight of another (idiom)/fig. to be unable to manage two or more things at once/cannot pay attention to one thing without neglecting the other
surname Gu
to look after/to take into consideration/to attend to
this/these
to lose/to miss/to fail
that/those/(one) another

sentences.english: Many women with children and jobs face the conundrum of neglecting one or the other.
sentences.chinese: 很多既有孩子也有工作的妇女面临顾此失彼的困境。

sentences.english: However, the two options will likely be in imbalance condition.
sentences.chinese: 但这两种选择难免会出现顾此失彼的权利失衡。

definition: (idiom) terribly busy/up to one's ears in work
no room to advance or to retreat (idiom); at a loss/in a hopeless situation
not knowing which course to follow (idiom); at a loss what to do
to struggle to cope (with a situation)/to be at one's wits' end
to be in straitened circumstances
(idiom) to lose one's head/to panic/to go to pieces
to be up to one's ears in work (idiom)/to be unable to attend to other things at the same time
(idiom) take care of everything; handle everything
(idiom) to become agitated/to get worked up
lit. pulling on the lapels exposes the elbows (idiom)/strapped for cash/unable to make ends meet
the will is there, but not the strength (idiom)/the spirit is willing but the flesh is weak
pinyin: xin1 you3 yu2 er2 li4 bu4 zu2

definition: careless/any-old-how, regardless of the specific task

definition: to fail within sight of success (idiom); last-minute failure/to fall at the last hurdle/snatching defeat from the jaws of victory
It's hard to clap with only one hand./It takes two to tango/It's difficult to achieve anything without support.
pincer attack/attack from two or more sides/converging attack/attack on a flank/fork in chess, with one piece making two attacks
less capable than desirable (idiom); not as strong as one would wish/the spirit is willing but the flesh is weak
